main.name: Daniel Murillo
main.description: I love programming, and everything that comes with it, from the creative process of thinking an idea and designing it, the thoughest parts of riddling, sitting down, question your existence and having an eureka moment, until you finally feel that is complete and show it to the world to let it grow
main.subtitle: Systems Engineer with love for coding
main.bio: I love programming, and everything that comes with it, from the creative process of thinking an idea and designing it, the thoughest parts of riddling, sitting down, question your existence and having an eureka moment, until you finally feel that is complete and show it to the world to let it grow
main.contactmessage: Do you think I could fit your necessities? Contact me!

interests.title: Game Development
interests.description: Game development is certainly my favorite. You can create a lot of different experiences that touches the heart of the people. I enjoy every step of the process so much that it's not a job for me. Even when my main job is not about game development, I find rejoice from gathering game development knowledge or by putting myself in front of a computer and creating some games

interests.title: Mobile and Web
interests.description: Using the mobile and web technologies is really interesting to me, especially when we can find new and interesting ways to use them and create cool and well designed solutions to all kind of problems
